channel.title: How would this be done?
channel.description: Ima trying to make my own server, from a blank source..I wanted to make it a 317 edge pking..vesta statius and the other aromrs and dragon claws..::master ::pure and ::pickup enabled..Just an all pking server..how would I do this though..:\

item.title: How would this be done?
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

[quote=“n00bf0rlyf3, post:7, topic:284475”]this is my command code in my client.java for pickup

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights > 1)) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“usage Use as ::pickup 800 100”);
}
}[/quote]

just change the player rights to 0

the armours are client sided if you have them get the item id and do like this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandname") && playerrights >=0)
[
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
addItem(itemid, 1);
sendMessage('ITEMS FOR YOU")'
}[/code]

for pure
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0)

   addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
   sendMessage("N33b!.");
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 0)
         {
   addSkillXP(14910000, 0);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 1);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 2);
   addSkillXP(14910000, 3);

   sendMessage("your a lazy fuck.");

wayne tanker:

Ima trying to make my own server, from a blank source…I wanted to make it a 317 edge pking…vesta statius and the other aromrs and dragon claws…::master ::pure and ::pickup enabled…Just an all pking server…how would I do this though…:\

Read full topic

item.title: How would this be done?
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

this is my command code in my client.java for pickup

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights > 1)) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“usage Use as ::pickup 800 100”);
}
}
